result.eng: We [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.
result.ga: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-EabhracWe [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn muid ag casaḋ sna tiṫe táḃairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-EaḃracWe [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.
